revision.text:
{{codepointer|r=Hexen}} '''A_SpawnBishop'''
(''no parameter'')
Tries to spawn a {{Class|Bishop}} at the location of the actor. If successful the actor's target and friendliness will be transferred. This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|SorcFX3}} and derived classes.
